document: {"blocks":[{"key":"4a8n0","text":"NEXTERA FLEX PROTOCOL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"69ch4","text":"1. In a 96 well plate add up to 10ug of DNA and bring the volume to 30ul for ALL samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e9jmk","text":"***label the plate well***","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dje6s","text":"2. TAGMENT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3mg06","text":"A. Make a master mix (MM) with 11ul * #samples BLT + 11ul * #samples TB1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":47,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":69,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aj394","text":"***Make sure BLT is mixed well before making master mix****","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2l4d5","text":"-BLT in Deli Fridge TB1 in -20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4idjd","text":"B. divide the MM equally into an 8 tube PCR strip ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2no2u","text":"C. use a multichannel pipette to add 20ul of MM to each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3p8eq","text":"D. Pipette up and down 10 times to mix well (be gentle)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"blbnb","text":"F. Put adhesive foil over the 96 well plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"906b0","text":"G. Put in the thermal cycler (preset program-- Folder= Covid, Program=1 Tagmentation)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3ccc6","text":"***(lid 100C, 55C 15 min, hold at 10C)***","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b90ac","text":"3. POST TAGMENTATION CLEANUP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5utap","text":"A. Add 10ul TSB to each reaction (use a multichannel pipette and 8 tube pcr strip)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d5ups","text":"-TSB in deli fridge (use at RT)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fidg4","text":"B. Pipette up and down 10 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5m2m6","text":"C. Seal plate with new adhesive foil","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9b0d3","text":"D. Put in thermal cycler (preset program-- Folder=Covid, Program=2 Cleanup)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2p069","text":"***(lid 100, 37C 15 min, hold at 10C)***","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2r32j","text":"E. Remove plate from thermocycler and put on magnet ~3min until solution is clear","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3564i","text":"F. Remove supernatant while plate is on the magnet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dbu63","text":"G. Remove plate from magnet and add 100ul TWB to each well and pipette slowly up and down to resuspend the beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":42,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"an9j2","text":"- TWB in deli fridge (use at RT)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b9ost","text":"H. Place plate back on the magnet and wait ~3 until the solution is clear","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5g050","text":"REPEAT STEPS F, G, H","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1g78j","text":"4 INDICES and AMPLIFICATION","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"74i72","text":"A. Prepare PCR master mix: 22ul * #samples EPM + 22ul * #samples WATER","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":43,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bk5qv","text":"***Mix Well***                -EPM in -20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"70s39","text":"B. Remove supernatant while plate is on the magnet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9gvia","text":"C.  Take the plate off of the magnet and add 40ul PCR master mix directly to the beads and pipette up and down to resuspend.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":45,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e9p4a","text":"D. Seal plate and centrifuge at 280g for 3 seconds (TQ cell culture)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dc1gp","text":"E. Add 10ul indices (using a 20ul multichannel pipette puncture the foil on the indices plate and transfer 10ul of each indices to sample plate)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9tcfh","text":"***Pipette up and down to resuspend***","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3isti","text":"F. Seal with adhesive foil and spin at 280g for ~15-30sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"crttm","text":"G. Put in thermal cycler and run (Folder=Covid, Program=3 Amplification)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6f6s1","text":"***When complete, put in 4 degrees for storage***","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9drhs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3h7cj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"27c5l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ctr93","text":"5. LIBRARY CLEANUP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"daqka","text":"Centrifuge plate at 280g for 1 min","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7degs","text":"Place plate on magnet and wait until liquid is clear","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6v5c1","text":"Transfer supernatant to a new 96 well plate (keep samples in order)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"28ofc","text":"Add 81ul SPB to each sample and pipette up and down 10 times to mix","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1g0aa","text":"***Vortex and invert SPB to mix***","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f40k","text":"Seal and incubate at RT for 5 minutes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ejcvr","text":"Place plate on magnet and wait until liquid is clear","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3p52d","text":"Remove the supernatant and discard (without disturbing the beads)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2j1ev","text":"Wash two times:","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4jtq2","text":"With plate on magnet add 200ul 80% EtOH","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2v4k6","text":"Incubate for 30 seconds","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"anneh","text":"Without disturbing the beads remove and discard the supernatant","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9h8t0","text":"Use 20ul pipette to remove and discard the residual ETOH","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fi2a5","text":"Air Dry the beads on the magnet for 5 minutes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9o1h1","text":"Remove plate from magnet and add 32ul RSB and pipette to resuspend beads","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8p9i9","text":"Incubate for 2min at RT","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"abptl","text":"Place plate on magnet and wait until liquid is clear","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"52geo","text":"Transfer ~30ul supernatant to a new 96 well plate (keep samples in order)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cseru","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"332qt","text":"6. QUBIT SAMPLES-- USE High Sensitivity Kit!!!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3jo0l","text":"Tubes QuBit tubes for each sample and TWO standards (Standard 1 and Standard 2)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eale9","text":"In a 15ml falcon tube add 8800ul Qubit HS Buffer and 44ulHS qubit dye and vortex","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":26,"length":6},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":53,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":16},{"style":"bold","offset":57,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d3rga","text":"Add 190ul of Buffer+Dye solution to the TWO standard tubes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eb64f","text":"Add 199ul of Buffer+Dye to the sample tubes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5kh0e","text":"Add 10ul of Standard 1 to the Standard 1 tube and Vortex","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7o7np","text":"Add 10ul of Standard 2 to the Standard 2 tube and Vortex","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8n1in","text":"Add 1ul of Samples to each Sample tube and Vortex","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"581m7","text":"Read standards on QuBit to generate a standard curve","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d7ftk","text":"Read Samples","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ai0pi","text":"**Record samples values in ng/ul","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7huko","text":"**Make sure you set the dilution factor to 1ul!!!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8ee4u","text":"***For samples \u003e600ng/ML please nanodrop to get a concentration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"vtkf","text":"7. Dilute to 4nanoMolar assuming 300bp average library size (calculations on spreadsheet)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8kgn4","text":"***STOP***","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2ek5l","text":"8. Pool 1ul of each sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a7cuc","text":"9. Tapestation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3g3cl","text":"10.Run MySeq","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fd9ve","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Nextera Flex DNA
